string.text: Hey, you said someone left some loot for me, right?
Oh... Mmm, yes, here it is...
Thank you. I'll take it now, please

Not so fast! I mean, I'm not trying to keep it from you. Of course it's yours. I kept it safe for you. I don't know if there's anything dangerous inside. My health's not so good these days, not like it used to be... So, that's a hundred rubles for keeping it safe for you. Fair price, okay?
What? You make a charge for, what do you call it? Safekeeping?
That's fine. Here's your loot...
Are you serious? That's my property. Hand it over now, or I'll make sure everyone knows about the way you do business...
Sorry, I'm broke. I'll have to pick it up later...
Here, take your 'diamond'...
Are you threatening me? Who do you think will listen to you?
Let's start with the newbies in the rookie camp. You can be sure they'll be a lot more careful in their dealings with you...
How about the Military? Do you know what they do with illegal traders in the Zone?
You're seriously trying to screw over someone considerably younger and stronger than yourself?
I have certain 'friends' here. In powerful positions...

Look, they all know that if they don't buy something from me, when it comes in, someone else will instead. This is the Zone!\n They can't leave the Zone, because soldiers guard all the exits and, believe me, they search you inside and out before taking their share. To go deeper into the Zone they'll need ammo and weapons, and where can they get those except from me?\n So frankly, I don't give a shit what you say to them...

Ah, now I know you're new here. You look like you're Military, and had me concerned for a moment...\n Think about it, newbie. From where do you suppose I get all this equipment? All these firearms and ammo? Who do you think is getting most of the artefacts past the Cordon? Stalkers come and go, but I do more business with the Military than anyone else!\n But you can go to them, if you want, and tell them all about me. But please come back and tell me what they said. That is, if you can find a way to communicate from the afterlife...

Look, I'm a trader. One of the most established in the Zone. This is how we make a living. If it wasn't for us, nobody would be able to stay or move anywhere. Hey, if you're a mean SoB, then just say so! But I have no respect for those who try to settle their arguments physically...

Remember, friendship ends where money begins. Your so-called 'friends' don't bother me. They may be powerful, but if they're outside the Zone, they have no influence here. If they're inside the Zone, tomorrow they'll be gone, God help them... This is the Zone, remember that. The most powerful are those who've been here the longest...
Okay, one hundred rubles. And take your gift...
Thank you...
Got it...
You have something for me? A guy left it with you, I hope?
Oh yes... A small package. I'd almost forgotten it. Here it is... Do you want it now?
Yes, please
No problem, here you go...
Thank you very much for looking after it for me
